price: Ɛberε a wͻbaa nehͻ no, wͻkaa sε: “‘Salaam’ Asomdwiε nka wo“.(Abraham nso) kaa sε: “Salaam: Asomdwiε nka mo”; moyε ahͻhoͻ a yenni mo.
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idh dakhalū ʿalayhi faqālū salāman qāla salāmun qawmun munkarūna
